text: Paula Sémer (9 April 1925 – 1 June 2021) was a Belgian actress and politician. She was a member of Forward. She was a member of the Senate of Belgium from 1995 to 1999. She worked for VRT. She was born in Antwerp, Belgium. Sémer died on 1 June 2021, aged 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian politicians Category:People from Antwerp
title: Paula Sémer
